data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision proves Trachusapubescens (Morawitz, 1872) sensu lato to be a complex of allopatric and sympatric species in South-Eastern Europe and Western Asia (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Anthidiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kasparek, Max (2018): Taxonomic revision proves Trachusapubescens (Morawitz, 1872) sensu lato to be a complex of allopatric and sympatric species in South-Eastern Europe and Western Asia (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Anthidiini). ZooKeys 764: 111-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.764.24581, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.764.24581
